UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: I'm NOT Done on Taris! If you are not on your ship right now, stop the bot, get on it and speak to Risha for 'The Vault'. Then get back on this planet and start the bot again! (you need to restart the bot)

UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: I'm Done on Taris! If you are not on your ship right now, get on it and complete 'Super Reactor'. Next Step is to travel to Nar Shaddaa, restart the bot and load up that quest profile on the planet!
